Daniele,

It seems for me that the most probable reason for this behavior i=
s 
that you changed the thermodynamic properties of some components in 
suc=
h a way that you actually have frozen your system. In other words, 
with ne=
w thermodynamic properties your system is already in 
equilibrium and there=
fore, does not change with time. To test this, 
try to change the thermodyn=
amic properties very gradually and look 
what will happen. Other possibilit=
ies such as very small time step, 
wrong reinitialization of an object etc.=
 could not be excluded though.

Best regards, Anatoli. 

--- In cantera@yah=
oogroups.com, "dottorato82" <daniele.chiappini@...> 
wrote:
>

good

I save variables like gas temperature,
